A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a lifelong Star Wars fan\, I cannot express how deep my disappointment was in this movie.  The plot was full of holes and the dialogue was atrocious.  It was a slow speed car chase in space according to my son.  I think what was done to the character of Luke was criminal and I cannot fathom who thought the whole casino sequence worked with this movie.  I had so much hope for this movie and it was dashed.
